definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Seeing slow dance and hearing fluted or stringed song.
sentences.chinese: 緩歌慢舞凝絲竹，盡日君王看不足。

sentences.english: From various Chinese musical instruments, people can find out the root of ancient Chinese national culture.
sentences.chinese: 從金石絲竹中，可探尋到中國古老民族的文化之根。

sentences.english: Sizhu music is the precious treasure of the music culture of Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 絲竹樂系中華民族音樂文化中之瑰寶。

definition: to play the zither/classical variant of 彈琴|弹琴[tan2 qin2]
variant of 弦/bow string/string of musical instrument/watch spring/chord (straight line joining two points on a curve)/hypotenuse
melodies of the elite in the state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]/highbrow art and literature
refined and elegant attitude of mind
variant of 流連|流连[liu2 lian2]
Guangling district of Yangzhou city 揚州市|扬州市[Yang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
